snippet: Russians are crediting Roszkh, a new Web site created by a political activist, with helping them to get long-overdue building repairs taken care of.
abstract: Moscow Journal; delighted Moscow residents are crediting Web site Roszkh for helping them to get long-overdue building repairs taken care of; site, created by political activist Aleksei Navalny, streamlines process for filing complaints about maintenance of communal areas of apartment buildings that remained public property after post-Soviet privatizations.
lead_paragraph: Russians are crediting Roszkh, a new Web site created by a political activist, with helping them to get long-overdue building repairs taken care of.

headline.seo: Russian Web Site Roszkh Fights Corruption Through Housing
headline.main: Fighting Corruption, One Handyman at a Time
headline.print_headline: Fighting Corruption, One Handyman at a Time
